title: Mariliendre
overview: Meri Rom√°n was the queen of the gay night in Madrid, but more than 10 years have passed from that. Now, at 35, she is a dethroned diva who lives tormented by her past and bored in her mediocre present. After her father's death, Meri reconnects with her entourage of gay friends, recalling her past and the musical themes that marked that time, while trying to define her chaotic life and identity.
